articles.title: Indian men's, women's teams bag bronze in roller skating - Rediff.com
articles.description: India's roller skaters clinched two bronze medals in men's and women's 3000m team relay events at the Asian Games on Monday.
articles.content:

articles.title: World Bank downgrades developing East Asia growth forecast, weighed by a slowing China - CNBC
articles.description: Even though East Asian economies have mostly recovered from the series of shocks since 2020, including the Covid-19 pandemic, the pace of growth will likely slow.
